text: what's it like living in close proximity
to the fracking industry it's loud
there's a lot of trucks in and out
there's a lot of people there's a lot of
sounds we used to sit here at night and
you could hear the hear the owls and
different animals and now you hear just
noise would you like to live in a house
just a few hundred yards away from this
and be quite happy living in a house
close to a site providing the operator
on those sites are conducting themselves
properly that they are designing the
sites in a safe manner all certain year
got trucks and Friday with trucks for
hire Tom sees has least some of his land
to a gas company I don't expect to get a
bunch of money out of it but you know
like I said I'm retired I get a little
bit you know extra money I'm not going
to complain
